title: @RIOT. Explain your pathetic excuse for a matchmaking system.
body:
So. Upon making it to Silver 2 in the preseason, I thought that at worst, I'd be placed in low silver and all would be well.

Nope. 'fraid not.

All bar 3 of these so called "placement matches" I had teams that went afk, that fed, that trolled, or any combination of...

Place in Bronze 2. An ENTIRE LEAGUE different to my pre-season placing.

Now I have to try and pull myself out of this cesspit that is OCE Bronze.

replies.body:
Funny thing, this actually has nothing to do with riots matchmaking system. They don't know who is gonna troll, who is gonna feed and who is gonna AFK.
Tis the school holidays and all the youths are out and about having a fun wee time trolling during placements. 
If you deserve to climb you will but at the moment your approximate MMR is lower than where you have been placed. 

Also.. I just checked your match history and in none of the games did anyone intentionally feed. They just got outplayed.
You obviously didn't then. Either that or you're unable to interpret statistics.
link me to the games then

The Matchmaking system does know who is going to troll, who is going to feed and who is going to AFK based on past matches. It intentionally matches you with those people when it feels like it, or when you've been winning too much.
So you're telling me that a *mathematical algorithm *that is based entirely on the theoretical concept of mmr knows when someone is going to troll?
I know the feels. Was Gold V, won 1 1 1 1 1 0 0 0 1 1 and got demoted to silver II

> [{quoted}](name=Deche,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=LEEATy8H,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-24T05:38:13.074+0000)
>
> I know the feels. Was Gold V, won 1 1 1 1 1 0 0 0 1 1 and got demoted to silver II

the %%%%

was gold 5


won 5 in a row, loss 5 in a row

g5 again

lel

LETS TROLL RIOT BACK FOR TROLLING US! 

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/Po4ZlA74-lets-troll-riot-back-instructions-in-this-thread
Riot needs to fix their custom game match making. I always get matched with tryhards
bronze = games can be won without relying on teammates to be useful = elo heaven

Yes you can solo carry a team in bronze if you get mid and go a hyper carry like fizz or zed. Otherwise your in elo hell. On top of that if you are let's say Kat and bot and top have fed then your screwed anyway. It is literally elo hell. I don't play carry roles and I struggle in bronze because I rely on my team. Sorry it annoys me when people like you say it is so easy to 1v5
Played on some kids b5 account and got to silver by winning 16 games in a row as ADC only and every game it was me vs and ultra fed enemy team while my team were walking wards...

> [{quoted}](name=Sethane,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=LEEATy8H,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-01-24T12:15:54.040+0000)
>
> Yes you can solo carry a team in bronze if you get mid and go a hyper carry like fizz or zed. Otherwise your in elo hell. On top of that if you are let's say Kat and bot and top have fed then your screwed anyway. It is literally elo hell. I don't play carry roles and I struggle in bronze because I rely on my team. Sorry it annoys me when people like you say it is so easy to 1v5

Its the same on each time, dude. If you belong higher and even if you play support, you will get higher. Sadly to say, carry roles do get you there faster.
I Agree, I won 7/10 games and got demoted from Gold V to silver II
Diamond 5 to plat 4. Im like 10-1 since placements because plat is %%%%ing easy. Should have no issue going up if you deserve to be higher.
That's a bit different though, you can't actually be placed in diamond from placement any season can you?
Plat 1 is the highest after placements

maybe you deserve bronze 2.
cause you're bad.
